descent.name: Descent
descent.description: A now playing web app for Last.fm that displays current album art and song details for a user, with the ability to control Philips Hue color lights based on album art colors. Automatically shows current weather.

plugdj-scrobbler.name: Plug.dj Scrobbler
plugdj-scrobbler.description: A Firefox add-on to scrobble tracks from community radio website Plug.dj to Last.fm. Supports live updating of now playing status. Officially published to and reviewed on the Firefox Add-ons website.

helvetica-text.name: Helvetica Text
helvetica-text.description: A Pebble smartwatch watchface based on the default Text Watch watchface. Shows the current time and date in words using an embed Helvetica font with a limited character set to reduce filesize. Developed at the request of a user on Reddit's Pebble subreddit.

snow-irc-bot.name: Snow IRC Bot
snow-irc-bot.description: A modular, multi-network IRC bot with many functions. Saves user data such as location and online usernames. Fetches weather, searches videos, controls Philips Hue lights, translates text, and more.

mypks-api.name: MyPKS API
mypks-api.description: An API for Six Flags employee scheduling website MyPKS that scrapes and returns web data in JSON format. Uses session hijacking to bypass Google's No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA.

rville-spirit.name: Rville Spirit
rville-spirit.description: An online apparel store for Robbinsville High School that manipulates embed code from PayPal Express Checkout to create a simple user-friendly interface. Products are stored in a database for easy additions and modifications.
